DOC.detailed_description: One hundred eighty drug-using individual seek treatment Substance Abuse Treatment Unit ( SATU ) Connecticut Mental Health Center randomize ( 1 ) standard outpatient counsel SATU ( typically consist weekly group counsel ) , ( 2 ) individual clinician deliver CBT , ( 3 ) web-based CBT4CBT . Treatments deliver 12-week period six-month follow-up termination study treatment . The primary outcome measure reduction substance use ( frequency drug use time , confirm urine toxicology screen ) . Secondary outcome include treatment utilization cost , several measure intend detect whether web-based CBT4CBT retain key characteristic traditional clinician-administered CBT ( e.g. , acquisition cop skill , use change strategy ) , participant characteristic evaluate potential moderator outcome , well participant satisfaction treatment credibility .
